author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police on Tuesday arrested two persons including a contract employee of a private agency for allegedly preparing fake ration cards. The arrested have been identified as Balamurugan (32), an employee of a private company hailing from Colas Nagar and Ramesh (32), a broker of Villianur.

The Department of Civil Supplies received a tip-off that a group was involved in making fake ration cards. The authorities lodged a complaint with the police who laid a trap and arrested Balamurugan and Ramesh. The duo has agreed to their involvement in making the fake cards and selling them to residents.

Police said Balamurugan who was employed in the technical section of the private agency had knowledge of the password and other details for preparing smart cards. The accused along with Ramesh, a broker and a few others generated over 100 fake ration cards. The duo was arrested. They were produced before a local court and remanded to custody in the Kalapet Central Prison.
title: 2 held for preparing fake ration cards
